entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
